geoQuery.query: SELECT id, type, label, x, y, sequence FROM pods.STO_FORECAST_SCHEMA_DECORATE order by id, sequence

WITH route_part_info as ( select * from ( select sb.station station_begin,se.station station_end,sb.route_id,c.*, rank() over (partition by ii.ili_inspection_id order by ii.begin_date desc) n from pods.event_range e,pods.station_point sb,pods.station_point se,pods.sto_ili_inspection_calc c, pods.ili_inspection ii where e.event_id=c.event_id and c.type_cl like 'Оценка состояния по межконструкционным участкам' and e.station_id_begin=sb.station_id and e.station_id_end=se.station_id and ii.ili_inspection_id=c.ili_inspection_id) d where n=1) select r.id, CASE WHEN i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION <= 0.03 THEN 'vas5_line' WHEN i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION <= 0.06 AND i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION > 0.03 THEN 'vas6_line' WHEN i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION <= 0.3 AND i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION > 0.06 THEN 'vas7_line' WHEN i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION > 0.3 THEN 'vas8_line' ELSE 'vas8_line' END "TYPE", i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION "label", r.x, r.y, r.sequence from pods.sto_forecast_route_part r left join route_part_info i on i.route_id=r.route_id and abs(i.station_begin-r.km_start)<1 and abs(i.station_end-r.km_end)<1 order by id,sequence
